languages.text: "Ничего я не слаба! Слабых Леди Теодора при себе не держала бы, да и Лорд-капитан тоже. Но... телепатический ритуал такого масштаба одна я и правда не потяну. Шепотки из-за дверки слушать или молнией шарахать — всегда пожалуйста. А искать всяких мутантов по их нечистым мыслишкам — это нужно постигать".

"I'm not weak! Lady Theodora didn't keep weaklings around, and neither does the Lord Captain. But... a telepathic ritual of that scale really would be too big of a bite for me on my own. If it's listening to the whispers from behind the door or frying someone with lightning — that I can do. But looking for mutants by following the trail of their unclean little thoughts — that takes a special kind of learning."
languages.original_text: "Ничего я не слаба! Слабых Леди Теодора при себе не держала бы, да и Лорд-капитан тоже. Но... телепатический ритуал такого масштаба одна я и правда не потяну. Шепотки из-за дверки слушать или молнией шарахать — всегда пожалуйста. А искать всяких мутантов по их нечистым мыслишкам — это нужно постигать".

languages.text: «¡No soy débil! Lady Theodora no mantenía debiluchos en su séquito, y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán actual tampoco. Pero... un ritual telepático de esa escala sería demasiado para mí en solitario. Si solo se trata de escuchar a los susurros al otro lado de la puerta o freír a alguien con un rayo, puedo hacerlo, pero buscar mutantes siguiendo el rastro de sus pensamientos impíos... para eso hace falta un adiestramiento especial».
languages.original_text: "I'm not weak! Lady Theodora didn't keep weaklings around, and neither does the Lord Captain. But... a telepathic ritual of that scale really would be too big of a bite for me on my own. If it's listening to the whispers from behind the door or frying someone with lightning — that I can do. But looking for mutants by following the trail of their unclean little thoughts — that takes a special kind of learning."

Si solo se trata de escuchar a los susurros al otro lado de la puerta o freír a alguien con un rayo, puedo hacerlo, pero buscar mutantes siguiendo el rastro de sus pensamientos impíos... para eso hace falta un adiestramiento especial».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「私は弱くないわ！シオドーラ様だって、ロード・キャプテンだって、弱い者はそばに置かない。でも…あれだけの規模のテレパシーの儀式は、私ひとりでは負担が大きすぎる。扉の向こうの囁きに耳を傾けたり、稲妻で誰かを焼いたりならできるけれど。でも、変異体の穢れた小さな思考の痕跡をたどって探すのは、特別な勉強が必要なのよ」
languages.original_text: "I'm not weak! Lady Theodora didn't keep weaklings around, and neither does the Lord Captain. But... a telepathic ritual of that scale really would be too big of a bite for me on my own. If it's listening to the whispers from behind the door or frying someone with lightning — that I can do. But looking for mutants by following the trail of their unclean little thoughts — that takes a special kind of learning."

traits.locale_text: 「私は弱くないわ！シオドーラ様だって、ロード・キャプテンだって、弱い者はそばに置かない。でも…あれだけの規模のテレパシーの儀式は、私ひとりでは負担が大きすぎる。扉の向こうの囁きに耳を傾けたり、稲妻で誰かを焼いたりならできるけれど。でも、変異体の穢れた小さな思考の痕跡をたどって探すのは、特別な勉強が必要なのよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我才不弱小呢！西奥多拉夫人根本不会把弱者留在身边，舰长大人也不会。但……老实说，那种程度的心灵感应仪式，对我一个人来说，确实是太强人所难了。如果是聆听门后的低语声，或者是发射闪电把人炸成焦炭，这种事情我都没问题。不过，若是要通过细微的邪恶思想来寻找变种人，这恐怕需要特殊的能力才能做到。”
languages.original_text: "I'm not weak! Lady Theodora didn't keep weaklings around, and neither does the Lord Captain. But... a telepathic ritual of that scale really would be too big of a bite for me on my own. If it's listening to the whispers from behind the door or frying someone with lightning — that I can do. But looking for mutants by following the trail of their unclean little thoughts — that takes a special kind of learning."

traits.locale_text: “我才不弱小呢！西奥多拉夫人根本不会把弱者留在身边，舰长大人也不会。但……老实说，那种程度的心灵感应仪式，对我一个人来说，确实是太强人所难了。如果是聆听门后的低语声，或者是发射闪电把人炸成焦炭，这种事情我都没问题。不过，若是要通过细微的邪恶思想来寻找变种人，这恐怕需要特殊的能力才能做到。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin nicht schwach! Lady Theodora hat keine Schwächlinge um sich geschart, und das tut auch der Lord Captain nicht. Doch ... ein telepathisches Ritual von diesen Ausmaßen wäre für mich alleine wirklich nicht zu bewerkstelligen. Wenn es darum geht, das Flüstern von jenseits der Tür zu belauschen oder jemanden mit Blitzen zu rösten, das kann ich. Aber nach Mutanten suchen, indem ich der Spur ihrer unreinen kleinen Gedanken folge, das erfordert schon eine ganz besondere Ausbildung."
languages.original_text: "I'm not weak! Lady Theodora didn't keep weaklings around, and neither does the Lord Captain. But... a telepathic ritual of that scale really would be too big of a bite for me on my own. If it's listening to the whispers from behind the door or frying someone with lightning — that I can do. But looking for mutants by following the trail of their unclean little thoughts — that takes a special kind of learning."

Aber nach Mutanten suchen, indem ich der Spur ihrer unreinen kleinen Gedanken folge, das erfordert schon eine ganz besondere Ausbildung."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas faible ! Dame Théodora n'avait pas pour habitude de s'entourer de mauviettes, pas plus que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine ici présent|la seigneure-capitaine ici présente}. Pour autant... il est vrai qu'un rituel télépathique d'une telle ampleur dépasse mes seules capacités. Écouter les murmures derrière les portes ou foudroyer une cible désignée, ça, c'est dans mes cordes. Mais pour débusquer des mutants en remontant la piste de leurs petites pensées impures, il faut posséder des compétences très particulières. »
languages.original_text: "I'm not weak! Lady Theodora didn't keep weaklings around, and neither does the Lord Captain. But... a telepathic ritual of that scale really would be too big of a bite for me on my own. If it's listening to the whispers from behind the door or frying someone with lightning — that I can do. But looking for mutants by following the trail of their unclean little thoughts — that takes a special kind of learning."

Mais pour débusquer des mutants en remontant la piste de leurs petites pensées impures, il faut posséder des compétences très particulières. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ben güçsüz değilim! Leydi Theodora, kabiliyetsizleri yanında tutmazdı. Aynısı Lord Kaptan için de geçerli. Ancak... Bu boyutta bir telepatik ayin benim boyumu aşar. Kapının ardındaki fısıltıları dinlemek ya da yıldırımla birini kızartmak gerekirse bunlar elimden gelir. Ancak günahkâr düşüncelerinin izlerini takip ederek mutantları aramak... Bunun için özel bir eğitimden geçmek gerekir."
languages.original_text: "I'm not weak! Lady Theodora didn't keep weaklings around, and neither does the Lord Captain. But... a telepathic ritual of that scale really would be too big of a bite for me on my own. If it's listening to the whispers from behind the door or frying someone with lightning — that I can do. But looking for mutants by following the trail of their unclean little thoughts — that takes a special kind of learning."
